又称海蚯蚓（Sea earthworm），主要是因为它们滤食习性，藉著不停地吃进珊瑚沙，把沙中的有机物消化掉，包括细菌、动物和植物 …

entry.def: An earthworm is a kind of worm which lives in the ground

means.word_mean: 1. terrestrial worm that burrows into and helps aerate soil; often surfaces when the ground is cool or wet; used as bait by anglers
